Great competitive club( YCL, ESPZEN, SINGA CUP, BORNEO CUP,) for ages 7-17, all my 3 loving ‚öΩÔ∏èkids,  joined 6 years ago when TURF FC was based at TURF city rainforest pitches, and enjoyed every minute of it, now they are at balestier cricket club, in a beautiful NATURAL GRASS pitch,

PLUS the really good joining point ‚Äî->> is the overseas PRE-SEASON training for 2 weeks mainly in europe( Athens, seville, belgrade, prague etc) where the kids get to enjoy friendlies with well established teams from top level‚öΩÔ∏è

Highly recommend the TURF CITY club with 2 of the best coaches right now,  in singapore youth football ( coach walid, coach tomas)üôè‚öΩÔ∏èüôè
Dedicated and skilled coaches! Flexible training programs! My two boys are so motivated to train hard yet enjoy the sports tremendously. They love being part of Turf City FC.

"I would like to highly recommend TURF CITY FC.  The training sessions are top-notch and the coaches are dedicated and knowledgeable. The team has a positive mindset and creates a supportive and encouraging environment for all players. My two boys have shown growth and improvement since joining the club, both in their skills on the field and confidence off the field. I am grateful for the positive impact this club has had on my kids and would not hesitate to recommend it to any young football player looking for a supportive and enriching experience."

My son is traning with Turf city club for the past one year and we are happy with his progress, sply like the league games that teaches them team work, strategy and gives them good exposure. Highly recomend
Great for teenagers who want to play in a competitive yet fun and exciting club!! Good camaraderie among players and very knowledgeable and supportive coaches.
